short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chair yoga Google Chrome extension for everyone
short.es: Una extensi√≥n de yoga en silla para todos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The namaschair Chrome Extension aims to offer a tool that helps people to become aware of the importance of overcoming sedentary lifestyles, by means of a productivity tool that will invite you to perform a simple yoga or breathing exercise every so often, preventing you from staying in front of the computer for more than 30 minutes at a time.
